meanings.definition: A person who is skilled in the use of technology.
meanings.sent1: The techies at the office fixed my computer issue.
meanings.sent2: Techies often enjoy discussing the latest gadgets.
meanings.sent3: The techies threw a tech-themed party with robot decorations.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, techies are the wizards.
meanings.sent5: I admire how techies can make complex things seem simple.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who are knowledgeable about technology.
meanings.sent1: Our group project was successful thanks to the techies in our team.
meanings.sent2: The techies shared their expertise during the workshop.
meanings.sent3: The techies formed a tech club to discuss their favorite gadgets.
meanings.sent4: Among us, the techies are like walking encyclopedias of technology.
meanings.sent5: The techies' passion for technology is contagious.

meanings.definition: The community of people who work in the technology industry.
meanings.sent1: Techies from different companies gathered at the tech conference.
meanings.sent2: The techies in Silicon Valley are known for their innovation.
meanings.sent3: The techies organized a charity event to support STEM education.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, techies are the heartbeat of progress.
meanings.sent5: The techies' dedication to technology is inspiring.
